label: Professional Internship
description: Off-campus experience in a field directly pertaining to a subject matter in horticulture. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated to a maximum of 4 hours.
courseSectionInformation: Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated to a maximum of 4 hours.
classScheduleInformation: For registration in this course students should contact the Department Teaching Coordinator.
